text_logic_form: The line segment $EC$ is equal to the altitude of triangle $AED$.
The measure of angle 1 is equal to $2x + 7$ degrees.
The measure of angle 2 is equal to $3x + 13$ degrees.

diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $BCA$ is equal to the measure of angle 2.
The measure of angle $ECB$ is equal to the measure of angle 1.
Point $B$ lies on the line segment connecting $E$ and $A$.
Point $C$ lies on the line segment connecting $A$ and $D$.
The length of the line segment $CA$ is equal to the length of the line segment $CD$.
